metadata.title: CVE-2017-9781 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Check_MK versions1.4.0x prior to 1.4.0p6, allowing an unauthenticated remote attacker toinject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via the _username parameter whenattempting authentication to webapi.py, which is returned unencoded withcontent type text/html.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
